lines.text: That defies all the laws of man and god.
There may be a new set of laws, John. Laws for a post-nuclear life we know nothing about.
All of us have survived more cumulative exposure than we ever thought possible.
You, uh... mean... we all may become like your brother? Stalking these woods at night eating raw meat?
Yeah, that's right. Now you know. You and your dime store stuff. You're cheap. A cheapie. I didn't know who cheap you were until I met her.
She hates your guts! You're cheap to her! She'd rather kill herself first!
I need meat, raw meat. I don't know, but I think it will do me good.
He's a mutation, Steve. Face it. He's a freak of this new atomic world of ours.
That's just a harmless animal in the bushes, that's all.
No, Steve! It's more! Let's go back in the house, please!
Somebody's watching us, I can feel it!
Joanna, go back to the house. I have a few words for this child-molester here!
Yes, I'll tell the girls the first thing in the morning.
Yes. They should bear children as soon as possible.
Yeah, that's right. Now you know. You and your dime store stuff. You're cheap. A cheapie. I didn't know how cheap you were until I met her.
She hates your guts! You're cheap to her! She'd rather kill herself first!
